type.name: org.gradle.platform.base.plugins.BinaryBasePlugin
type.description: * Base plugin for binaries support. * * - Adds a {@link BinarySpec} container named {@code binaries} to the project. * - Registers the base {@link BinarySpec} type. * - For each {@link BinarySpec}, registers a lifecycle task to assemble that binary. * - For each {@link BinarySpec}, adds the binary's source sets as its default inputs. * - Links the tasks for each {@link BinarySpec} across to the tasks container.
